title: Carolina BBQ
directions: Place pork shoulder, bay leaf, red pepper and water in large pot with lid.  Bring to boil.  Simmer covered 4 to 5 hours until meat is tender.  Let meat cool in broth.  Remove excess fat from broth and shred meat.
Take 3 cups of liquid and bring to boil.  Combine liquid with vinegar, sugar, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce and garlic.  Add shredded pork and salt.  Heat through uncovered.
